mapper.insert: INSERT INTO virtual_call_doctor_fix_field(call_id, doctor_id, doctor_name,gender, telephones,is_add_wechat,wechat,email,address,depart,title,hospital, province,city,hospital_level) VALUES(#{callId}, #{doctorId}, #{doctorName},#{gender},#{telephoneStr}, #{isAddWechat},#{wechat}, #{email}, #{address}, #{depart}, #{title,}, #{hospital}, #{province}, #{city},#{hciLevel})
